title: Resisting Payne
description: In school, I was the guy that even the kids from the wrong side of the tracks wanted nothing to do with. After graduation, there was nothing left for me in Cambridge, so I put everything that mattered in my backpack and left town. Meeting Kenzie was not part of my plan. Now, I have to find a way to resist the magnetic pull we feel to one another.
author: H.B. Heinzer
